mapper.select: select ifnull(a.print_seq,' ') print_seq, ifnull(a.asset_seq,' ') asset_seq, ifnull(a.asset_no,' ') asset_no, ifnull(a.rfid_no,' ') rfid_no, ifnull(a.asset_name,' ') asset_name, ifnull(a.asset_size,' ') asset_size, ifnull(a.asset_type,' ') asset_type, ifnull(a.aqusit_dt,' ') aqusit_dt, ifnull(a.org_no,' ') org_no, ifnull(a.inv_year,' ') inv_year, ifnull(a.inv_no,' ') inv_no, ifnull(a.req_system,' ') req_system, ifnull(a.print_dt,' ') print_dt, ifnull(a.print_type,' ') print_type, ifnull(a.print_yn,' ') print_yn, ifnull(a.tmp_title,' ') tmp_title, ifnull(a.etc1,' ') etc1, ifnull(a.etc2,' ') etc2, ifnull(a.etc3,' ') etc3, ifnull(a.etc4,' ') etc4, ' ' user_name from rfid_print_history a left outer join rfid_asset ast on a.asset_no = ast.asset_no where a.print_yn = 'N' and a.org_no = #{orgNo} order by print_seq
mapper.update: update rfid_print_history set print_yn = 'R' where print_yn = 'N' and org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.select: select ifnull(a.print_seq,' ') print_seq, ifnull(a.asset_no,' ') asset_no, ifnull(a.rfid_no,' ') rfid_no, ifnull(a.asset_name,' ') asset_name, ifnull(a.asset_size,' ') asset_size, ifnull(a.asset_type,' ') asset_type, ifnull(a.aqusit_dt,' ') aqusit_dt, ifnull(a.org_no,' ') org_no, ifnull(a.inv_year,' ') inv_year, ifnull(a.inv_no,' ') inv_no, ifnull(a.req_system,' ') req_system, ifnull(a.print_dt,' ') print_dt, ifnull(a.print_type,' ') print_type, ifnull(a.print_yn,' ') print_yn, ifnull(a.tmp_title,' ') tmp_title from rfid_print_history a left outer join rfid_asset ast on a.asset_no = ast.asset_no where a.print_yn = 'N' and a.org_no = #{orgNo} order by print_seq
mapper.update: update rfid_print_history set print_yn = 'R' where print_yn = 'N' and org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.select:
select a.* from rfid_print_history a where 1=1
ORDER BY #{dataOrder} #{dataOrderArrow}, a.print_dt desc
ORDER BY a.print_dt desc
select count(*) from rfid_print_history a where 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rfid_print_history ( print_seq, asset_seq, asset_no, rfid_no, asset_name, asset_size, asset_type, aqusit_dt, org_no, inv_year, inv_no, req_system, print_dt, print_type, print_yn, tmp_title, etc1, etc2, etc3, etc4 ) SELECT #{printSeq} , #{assetSeq} , ast.asset_no , ast.rfid_no , ast.asset_name , ast.asset_size , ast.item_name asset_type , ast.aqusit_dt , '10001' org_no , #{invYear} inv_year , #{invNo} inv_no , #{reqSystem} req_system , #{printDt} , #{printType} , 'N' print_yn , concat(ifnull(ast.user_name,' '), ' - ', ifnull(ast.pos_name,' ')) tmp_title , ast.user_name etc1 , (case when ast.top_asset_no is null or ast.top_asset_no = '' then ast.asset_no else concat(ast.top_asset_no, ' / ', ast.asset_no) end) as etc2 , null etc3 , null etc4 FROM rfid_asset ast WHERE ast.ASSET_SEQ = #{assetSeq}

INSERT INTO rfid_print_history_tmp ( tmp_code, print_seq, asset_seq, asset_no, rfid_no, asset_name, asset_size, asset_type, aqusit_dt, org_no, inv_year, inv_no, req_system, print_dt, print_type, print_yn, tmp_title, etc1, etc2, etc3, etc4 ) SELECT #{tmpCode} , #{printSeq} , #{assetSeq} , ast.asset_no , ast.rfid_no , ast.asset_name , ast.asset_size , ast.item_name asset_type , ast.aqusit_dt , '10001' org_no , #{invYear} inv_year , #{invNo} inv_no , #{reqSystem} req_system , #{printDt} , #{printType} , 'N' print_yn , concat(ifnull(ast.top_dept_name,' '), ' - ', ifnull(ast.dept_name,' '), ' - ', ifnull(ast.pos_name,' ')) tmp_title , ast.user_name etc1 , (case when ast.top_asset_no is null or ast.top_asset_no = '' then ast.asset_no else concat(ast.top_asset_no, ' / ', ast.asset_no) end) as etc2 , ast.aqusit_amt etc3 , remark etc4 FROM rfid_asset ast WHERE ast.ASSET_SEQ = #{assetSeq}

INSERT INTO rfid_print_history ( print_seq, asset_seq, asset_no, rfid_no, asset_name, asset_size, asset_type, aqusit_dt, org_no, inv_year, inv_no, req_system, print_dt, print_type, print_yn, tmp_title, etc1, etc2, etc3, etc4 ) SELECT print_seq, asset_seq, asset_no, rfid_no, asset_name, asset_size, asset_type, aqusit_dt, org_no, inv_year, inv_no, req_system, print_dt, print_type, print_yn, tmp_title, etc1, etc2, etc3, etc4 FROM rfid_print_history_tmp WHERE tmp_code = #{tmpCode}

insert into rfid_print_history( asset_no,rfid_no,asset_name,asset_size,asset_type,aqusit_dt,org_no,inv_year,inv_no,req_system,print_dt,print_type,print_yn,tmp_title,etc1,etc2,etc3,etc4 ) select asset_no ,rfid_no ,asset_name ,asset_size ,asset_type ,aqusit_dt ,org_no ,inv_year ,inv_no ,req_system ,#{print_dt} print_dt ,print_type ,'N' print_yn ,tmp_title ,etc1 ,etc2 ,etc3 ,etc4 from rfid_print_history where print_seq = #{printSeq}
